CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 6, 1948, pg. 8, reads: " Crowning Mrs. Achievement - Pictured at the annual reception given by the National Achievement Clubs, Inc., are "Mrs. Achievement," Mrs. Katherine Armstrong being crowned by Miss Mura A. Johns, and a group of charming hostesses at the affair, held at Ammon Recreation Center...Second grouping, left to right; Mrs. Rachel Wheeler, Mrs. McClain, Mrs. Rowena, Mary Yance, Mrs. Viola Woods, Mrs. C. Colman, Mrs. Nellie Clemens, Mrs. Margaret T. Lightfoot, Mrs. A. Poindexter, Mrs. Lillian Thompson, Miss Myra Johns, Miss Dorothy Pickertt and Mrs. Alma Illery, national president and founder of Achievement Club. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Women, from left: Rachel Wheeler, Mrs. McClain, Mrs. Rowena, Mary Yance, Viola Woods, Mrs. C. Colman, Nellie Clemens, Margaret T. Lightfoot, Mrs. A. Poindexter, Lillian Thompson, Myra Johns, Dorothy Pickertt, and Alma Illery, standing in line for National Achievement Clubs, Inc. annual reception, Ammon Center
